subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Facing his old team, Butler buried three fourth-quarter 3-pointers Friday, breaking out of a shooting slump and helping the Thunder seize a 2-1 lead against the Clippers.
snippet: Facing his old team, Butler buried three fourth-quarter 3-pointers Friday, breaking out of a shooting slump and helping the Thunder seize a 2-1 lead against the Clippers.
